description:
Growing West Los Angeles full-service Law firm seeks Litigation Legal Assistant to join their firm. Litigation Legal Assistant must have 4 years of civil litigation defense experience. BA/BS degree is strongly preferred. Firm offers competitive salary, full benefits package, work-life balance, and a hybrid on-site/remote work location. Litigation Legal Assistant will provide administrative support to bankruptcy litigation attorneys with duties including the following: enter attorney billing into e-billing software, use document management system for all matter-related documents, case management, court filings, calendar management, calendaring, trial preparation, and draft and proofread correspondence. Please submit your resume for immediate and confidential consideration.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, age, ancestry, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, disability, medical condition, genetic information, pregnancy, or military or veteran status. We consider all qualified applicants, including those with criminal histories, in a manner consistent with state and local laws, including the City of Los Angeles' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance.
